body.raw:
Having exchanged ideas and pursued blockchain endeavors with many of the greatest minds, Yanislav is a true veteran of
the blockchain space. Back in 2013, the "Godfather of Ethereum" envisioned powerful algorithms on blockchains. Now, with
æternity, a new version of his vision is becoming reality once more.
body.html: Having exchanged ideas and pursued blockchain endeavors with many of the greatest minds, Yanislav is a true veteran of the blockchain space. Back in 2013, the "Godfather of Ethereum" envisioned powerful algorithms on blockchains. Now, with æternity, a new version of his vision is becoming reality once more.
